title: 1.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Evaâ€™s teacher, Mr. Jon, has asked the class to prepare a document on the Importance of Collaboration during the summer break as an assignment. He has divided a class of forty pupils into four groups, each containing ten students, to perform this assignment as a group activity. Help Eva and her classmates to create four distinct Google Groups, containing ten students each. Add a proper name and a description to each of the groups along with the email addresses of all the members.
